document.full_text: a federal attorney who took nearly $500,000 in bribes from immigrants seeking to remain in the united states has been jailed for almost 18 years, authorities said on monday.
document.title: bribe-taking federal attorney jailed for 18 years
lines_and_colors: a federal attorney who took nearly $500,000 in bribes from immigrants seeking to remain in the united states has been jailed for almost 18 years, authorities said on monday.
